text: hi greg herman i'm a senior security
partner strategist at aws
[Music]
my biggest heartwarming
aspect that i've seen over the years is
the way public sector not just in the
u.s but outside of the us are really
adopting the cloud getting to visit
different countries getting to visit
different organizations seeing both the
successes and the pain points that our
customers are feeling internationally
and really diving in with them and
understanding the intricacies of every
different country and region and
perspective on cloud computing and on
aws is one of the best things that i've
been on board to witness
the purpose of the security compliance
and acceleration program is really to
help support our aws customers meet
differing regulatory security and
compliance requirements on aws and we're
a partner program and we are going to be
a scalable program to support customers
globally we're not just here to help
customers today we're looking to the
future to design new capabilities we try
to take a consistent approach
both in the u.s and outside of the u.s
so generally we break down
the verticals into three financial
services healthcare and life sciences
and then the third is public sector and
you can't go from country to country and
assume public sector always means the
same thing you have to think about
things like socialized healthcare so
healthcare is now pulled into the public
sector in that regard
and so that's why we keep these three
verticals loosely based
that way we don't have to adjust
our vision every time we look at a new
country or a new region
if a customer contacts our team we're
going to meet with them first for a
short meeting to evaluate two primary
things one
what are they trying to accomplish the
second question we're trying to answer
is
do they have the technical capabilities
on aws to meet the security requirements
um that they ultimately need to if they
don't understand the regulatory
requirements that's when we'll make a
strong recommendation they work with one
of our partners we have a service called
aws artifact we have a number of
documents in there that support our
customers in meeting regulatory
requirements fedramp customer packages
ems packages
in spain
we have gdpr white paper i mean we have
a host of materials one of the primary
goals of our program is to both reduce
cost and reduce time
in meeting your regulatory requirements
the isvs the sas providers these are
partners that develop security solutions
of some kind that help customers meet
their regulatory security compliance
requirements on aws but you may need to
pull in some of their tooling to either
help secure your environment or make it
more efficient secondly we have
systems integrators and these systems
integrators they kind of straddle the
line between an isv
and a consulting partner
the goal of what they do is to get you
sort of a 70 80 solution
you know within a week or two as opposed
to having to build and configure every
aws service every capability um from
scratch
and then lastly we have what we call
consulting partners but generally our
consulting partners fall into two
flavors one the auditors and assessors
we have a shared responsibility model
the auditors and assessors that join our
program they have a strong foundation in
aws they understand where
aws's responsibility ends and the
customer's responsibility begins the
other half of that consulting partner
coin
is general consultants these are
generally organizations that will come
work with you they'll help you architect
but they'll also understand the
different compliance and regulatory
processes and they will be your guiding
light through those processes to assure
you through as quickly as possible
there's a number of different benefits
so
joining the program you'll get a batch
you can put it on all your marketing
materials it demonstrates that you are a
subject matter expert in security
regulatory and compliance
on aws
secondly you're going to be joining a
group of partners that are all
like-minded giving you opportunities to

things third you'll get added to our
website customers can actually come to
our website find you on the website and
contact you directly if you go to the
ato and aws
program website it'll walk you through
the process of exactly how to join the
program we don't just let any partner
join the program when they join our
program we expect them to be subject
matter experts either in financial
services health care public sector or
some combination of the three and so
there is an onboarding checklist you'll
have to review that checklist validate
that you meet all the requirements and
then submit an application through
partner central like you would for any
other aws program within a couple days
somebody will reach out to have that
introductory call with you we have
alias particularly if you're talking
about outside of the united states it's
global acceleration at amazon.com
now if you're strictly a us-based

you can submit the questionnaire or we

we've launched in a number of different

we have a couple more we're going to be

so ultimately we plan for this program

additionally you can expect innovation
